title: ‘That Win Was the Huge Step I Needed:’ How Everything Changed for Matteo Jorgenson at the Tour of Oman
content:
A breakthrough in last year's Oman tour helped seal the Visma-Lease a Bike deal: 'You need to get that first win to realize that you’re capable of doing it.'

Read the full article at ‘That Win Was the Huge Step I Needed:’ How Everything Changed for Matteo Jorgenson at the Tour of Oman on Velo.
author: ahood
